rows.label: qev030103_MSG0001
rows.name:
My brother is safe. I am relieved.
They were ready to kill us both.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030103_MSG0002
rows.name:
There may be others needing rescue.
You must be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030103_MSG0003
rows.name:
I worry about Oll. He may try to save me.
He may do something rash. That is who he is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030103_MSG0004
rows.name: Do not let Cavern Clan hurt him. Please![ST:wait ]
